testcase.name: Login to application
testcase.system-out: Given User should navigate to ProAcc page...................................passed And User enters Harry_Consultant and a12345@................................passed When User clicks on LOG IN button...........................................passed Then User will be logged in successfully....................................passed

testcase.name: Create Analysis functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User is on create analysis page.......................................passed When User has to select Customer NameHarry Test, Project NameHarry Pilot Phase Test and Instance NameH01 from the dropdown.passed And User has to upload SAP READINESS CHECK FILES for ActivitiesActivities.xlsx, BWExtractorsBwextractors.xlsx, CustomCodeCustomCode.xlsx, HANADatabaseHanaDatabaseTables.xlsx, FioriAppsRecommendedFioriApps.xlsx, RelevantSimplificationRelevantSimplificationItems.xlsx, SAPReadinessSAP Readiness Check.docx.passed And User has to click on the term of use and acknowldge checkboxes..........passed And User has to click on start analysis button..............................passed Then User should successfully navigate to readinesscheck....................passed
